item.title: Variables in Photoshop: Data Merge

item.title: CSS Sprite Sheet Animation
item.description: In this video, Mark demonstrates a CSS Sprite Sheet animation and moves a sprite using JavaScript. You'll learn how to use a sprite sheet with a walk cycle for a sprite, and how to code JavaScript to move a character in response to a mouse event. This is a great place to start learning CSS-style animation.
